rules_text:
Haste
[i]Rekindling of Dead Ashes[/i] – {1}{B}: Exile target card in a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying and haste.
flavor_text: [i]“Oh yeah, I forgot something. If you die around here, you'll burn so hard there won't even be ashes left... I'd better take you out here!”[/i]
